column4: what is the difference in Ubuntu 7.04 that you download off of the ubuntu.com site, and Ubuntu Feisty Fawn 7.04 ?
none?  I'm not sure I understand the question...
the dvd has all of the main and restricted repository including kubuntu, xubuntu, etc...

ubuntu uses gnome by default, kubuntu uses kde, xubuntu uses xfce.  They all use the same repository and you can install the same programs (including kde on ubuntu).  The difference is the default programs and settings
